features: 💡【EYE-CARING LED AND TIMING FUNCTION】- No flicker lighting, No glare, No blue light, No ghosting. This touch table lamps that won't fatigue your eyes even after long hours of use, whether it is for work, studying, or simply reading. It also has a timing function that can save energy if you accidentally fall asleep while studying or working.

💡 【TOUCH CONTROL DIMMABLE DESK LAMP】- Study Lamp has 5 color temperature modes, 3000K, 3500K, 4000K, 4500K,5000K. It also has fully brightness, Touch and slide to adjust the brightness and enable you to customize your desired light for work, study, reading, or relaxing.

💡【ADJUSTABLE ANGLE & FOLDABLE DESIGN】- Foldable led desk lamp with 180° adjustable arm and 90° rotating axis base for more flexible illumination, foldable lamp arm and small-footprint lame base for most space saving. Easy to place in shelves, bags, suitcases, and box.

💡【WIRELESS CHARGER AND USB CHARGING PORT】- Table lamp has a USB charging port and a fast wireless charger. This means you can charge two devices and work with a lamp at the same time. This USB charging port is suitable for adapter, laptop, computer, power bank, and so on. ( Pls note: the lamp itself does not have a battery)

💡【PREMIUM SERVICE】Adopting aluminum alloy heat sink, Up to 50000hrs Lifespan, 40 times longer than a typical incandescent light. The desk lamp is worry-free for one year and has a lifetime of attentive service. If you receive a damaged, defective or non-compliant item, please contact us and we will immediately replace it with a new item or give you a full refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Productivity!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the LED Desk Lamp for my home office, and it has been an absolute game-changer for my work environment. This sleek and modern lamp not only enhances the aesthetics of my workspace but also provides outstanding functionality.The adjustable brightness levels and color temperatures are a standout feature. Whether I'm working on a detailed project, reading a document, or simply relaxing, I can easily customize the lighting to suit my needs. The eye-friendly, flicker-free illumination reduces eye strain during long working hours, making it a perfect companion for anyone spending extended periods in front of a computer.One of the things I love about this lamp is the adjustable design. The rotatable head and flexible arm allow me to direct the light precisely where I need it, providing optimal lighting conditions for any task. The touch-sensitive controls are intuitive and responsive, allowing for seamless adjustments with just a tap.The built-in USB port is a thoughtful addition, enabling me to conveniently charge my devices without cluttering my desk with additional chargers. The lamp's compact footprint also makes it suitable for smaller workspaces, and its modern design adds a touch of elegance to my home office setup.Durability is another aspect where this LED desk lamp shines. The build quality is excellent, and the materials used feel premium. It's evident that the manufacturers paid attention to both form and function.In conclusion, this LED Desk Lamp has exceeded my expectations in terms of performance, design, and functionality. It has become an essential part of my home office setup, enhancing my productivity and creating a comfortable and stylish workspace. If you're in the market for a reliable and versatile desk lamp, look no further – this one ticks all the boxes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple. Sleek. Lightweight. Bright. Effective. Recommended!
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Lightweight. Plug 'n play (so to speak) it's just 1 piece, no assembly, no surprises! Except one great one-- The side of the box as well as the overview spec sheet inside the box, both list the instructions to supply power to the lamp (e.g phone charger, computer, power bank) and the max current to use (DC 5V ≈ 2-3Amps)Which led me to believe I was going to be supplying my own power source. However, in the box is a charging block, and USB-A to USB-C cable. The block is of course 5V at 2000mA (2A) which = 10Watts. The lamp only uses 8W, and it's really bright- on low it's a good evening reading lamp. On medium, it's enough to illuminate my L shaped corner desk and surrounding area. On high with it set up as base __ flat obviously, vertical arm in the straight 180° vertical position, and the lamp at a 90° angle, (parallel to the base) sitting at 32" height, it casts light for 20ft before dimming at all (yes I have been testing it with no other lights on...OH tip: and really- REALLY heed their warnings and "DO NOT LOOK DIRECTLY AT THE LAMPS LED'S" which seems obvious, but it's surprisingly easy to do whilst testing & adjusting it into any of the dozens of possible positions-- It's like that one lady at yoga that can make herself into a pretzel and walk on her feet after they're wrapped over her shoulders, leaving you to just stare & imagine how much you would give for a woman (or dude, no judgment here) with that type of...physical fitness... ;-)So the pros are all good- price is great - touch is very responsive.I had hoped it would be a rechargeable by light, glow in the dark type situation-- u know, like open 3 dot absolute witness primary on a Glock or Wesson that are white by day, but after exposure to daylight they glow green in the dark... but nope.but this lamp-- It's def worth it at what? $15? Less perhaps...Cons: None really-- i mean the led bulbs cannot be replaced, but hey- they cost enough to justify replacing the lamp... if I get two years out of it- great. I know, E-waste, but I imagine it will last longer. (Edit 8 months later: Still as good as day 1)Definitely recommend 👌🏽 👍🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Decent LED Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: Works great for my needs. Lowest setting is too dim to be used for anything practical, but 2nd and 3rd brightness setting are good. (I use the lowest setting as a night time illuminator [yes, i just didnt wanna say 'night light'])No visible ghosting or banding due to the LEDs, the plastic diffuser strip they used does a good enough job.Ability to tilt and rotate the lamp is definitely useful.It's neutral design matches aesthetically to my office area.The light is a pleasant neutral white, not too blue or yellow at all.This one came with an appropriate voltage USB power plug, which is a nice bonus (some of these LED lamps do not).The 5v USB port is handy, though it would have been better to have the port on the sides or front of the unit instead of the rear. I find myself having to move the darn thing just to be able to use the USB port.The USB-C cord included is a bit short, which limits your options as far as where you can place the lamp. I wound up using a 6ft cord I had laying around.For what I paid, I am more than satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT LITTLE LAMP
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new lamp for my home office and this was pretty similar to one I'd had in the past. There is no set up other than pulling it out of the box and unwrapping it. Power cord plugs in to a regular outlet. Has one USB port, which is fine, I use it for a short cable to charge whatever I need at the moment - my phone, my mouse, my keyboard. Light intensity is great - at the highest setting it'll make you go blind if you look at the LCD bulbs, and the lowest setting is good enough to light my desk and work on my laptop. It has a timer, which would be useful for a bedside lamp when you'd be too sleepy to reach over and turn it off. It does have a wireless phone charger, but I'm not using it because I have a phone ring on the back of my phone. Overall quite useful, very economical. I would definitely recommend it to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Lamp for Small Spaces
reviews.reviewText: Very well designed for direct/indirect lighting with three brightness levels. Small footprint on work surface. Great value for price.
